channel.title: Need help with a error
channel.description:
Ok, Im adding a handler to my server but i keep getting this error after 5 times of redoing it... I think i know the problem it seems pretty obvious but i can't fix it...
ffhandler.java:9 class ffHandler is public, should be declared in a file named ffHandler.java public class ffHandler { ^ 1 error
any hints please?

item.title: Need help with a error
item.dc:creator: @omgwater omgwater
item.description:
@omgwater wrote:

i figured out my problem… when i saved my file it was ment to be "“ffHandler” not “ffhandler” a simple fix… should of tried the 6th time befor posting lol

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a error
item.dc:creator: @WonkeyWoo WonkeyWoo
item.description:
@WonkeyWoo wrote:

It’s obviosly the class named. You should take a look at other file reviews and use that piece of handler text.

Read full topic

Ok, Im adding a handler to my server but i keep getting this error after 5 times of redoing it… I think i know the problem it seems pretty obvious but i can’t fix it…
